anathuruwa waliwita asarana sarana saranankara himi wethin dharma shasthraya igenima pinisa mahanuwara malwathu wiharayata wadama kota ewakata pawathi siyaluma ugathamana shilpayan hadara agraganya padi ruwanak bawata pathwiya. 1783 di dharmarama himiyanata shri padasthanaye nayaka padawiyada, pahatharata sanghanayaka padawiyada shri pada adawiyata ayath wehalle thambaa sannasa saha athdala joduwa da rajasinha raju wisin pirinama thibunu bawa sadahan we.

ada dawasa wanawita wathman rajaya dakune janathawa wenuwen athi wishala wada kotasak itu kara thibenawa.ebawin ada apata mathiwaranayak wenuwenya kiya wisheshayen sudanam wimak awashyawanne naha.dakune janathawa apa samanga bawin mathiwaranayaka di apage jayagrahanaya pilibandawa kisidu sakayak nomathi bawa hambanthota disthrik parlimenthu manthri namal rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.dakunu palath sabha mathiwaranaye ejanisa apekshaka kanchana wijesekara mahathage meheyawimen shri.la.ni.pakshaye mathara disthrik samajikayan, pradeshiya sabha sabhapathiwarun ha manthriwarun samanga paksha kriyakarin danuwath kirime hamuwakata ekwemin me bawa penwa dun manthriwaraya wadiduratath adahas dakwamin,dakunata jathyanthara warayak, maththalata guwan thotupalak, dakshina deshayata adhiwegi margayak, mathara sita katharagamata nawa dumriya margayak , man mawath, guwan palam aadi kothekuth de dakune janathawage as idiripita pahadili udaharana washayen pawathinawa.diwayina purama daruwange adhyapana thaththwaya eka samana mattamakata lanwi thibenawa.
